sentences.cn: 所有离港航班皆已停飞。

sentences.en: And you must be friendly and outgoing.
sentences.cn: 你必须好相处,性格外向.

sentences.en: He had been outgoing, aggressive, ambitious, he planned to go into politics.
sentences.cn: 他社交广泛,进取心强,敢作敢为, 雄心勃勃, 一心想进入政界.

sentences.en: He is an outgoing and lively person.
sentences.cn: 他是个性格开朗而又活泼的人.

sentences.en: He's not the thoroughly outgoing character you'd predict, although he has his moments.
sentences.cn: 虽然他也有活泼的时候，但他并非如你所想的那么外向。

sentences.en: His colleagues paid generous tributes to the outgoing president.
sentences.cn: 同事们纷纷向即将卸任的总裁致敬.

sentences.en: She arrived to receive the sash of office from the outgoing president.
sentences.cn: 她走上前去从即将离职的总统手中接过了就职腰带。

sentences.en: She has a very outgoing personality.
She is such a gregarious and outgoing person.
sentences.cn: 她很外向，喜欢交朋结友。

sentences.en: She is the outgoing head of a large corporation.
sentences.cn: 她是一家大公司即将离职的负责人.
放置外发信件的公文格

sentences.en: These two pieces of incoming and outgoing mail alternately adorned his desk.
sentences.cn: 这一封来函,一封去信,轮流地在他桌上妆点着.

sentences.en: Underneath his outgoing behaviour Luke was shy.
sentences.cn: 在外向活泼的外表下，卢克其实很害羞。

sentences.en: We’re looking for someone with an outgoing personality.
sentences.cn: 我们在找一个性格外向的人。

sentences.en: Would you describe yourself as outgoing or more reserved?
sentences.cn: 你认为你是个外向的人还是内向的人?

phrases.tran_cn: 外埠邮件；发文，外发函件

trans.tran_cn: 对人友好的，开朗的，出发的，外出的，即将离职的，乐于助人的
trans.tran_en: someone who is outgoing likes to meet and talk to new people

trans.tran_cn: 外出, 开支, 流出
